game.name: NolyRhythm
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get into the rhythm of the music! If you keep getting into the groove, you'll clear the game before you know it! This is the casual rhythm game "NolyRhythm"!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get into the rhythm of the music! If you keep getting into the groove, you'll clear the game before you know it! This is the casual rhythm game "NolyRhythm"!
